sys_variable_value.value: Interview Scheduled and Verification Process Completed

sys_element_mapping.value:
Dear,Trigger - Record Created or Updated➛...➛First Name  Trigger - Record Created or Updated➛...➛Last Name

I hope this email finds you well.

We are pleased to inform you that your interview for the Trigger - Record Created or Updated➛...➛Role position at KREEYA TECHNOLOGIES has been scheduled. 

Below are the details:

 Please check the availability of your interviewer 

5 - Create Record➛...➛Calendly Link

Additionally, we have successfully completed your verification process.

Please make sure to review the interview details and prepare accordingly. If you have any questions or need further assistance, feel free to reach out.

We look forward to meeting you!

Good Luck For your Interview

Best Regards,

HR KREEYA.

short_description={{Created or Updated_1.current.user_name}} Interview Scheduled On^name_of_the_candidate={{Created or Updated_1.current.user_name}}^employee_id={{Created or Updated_1.current.number}}^email_id={{Created or Updated_1.current.email}}^calendly_link=https://calendly.com/konduritanvi08/bow-ruggeri?month=2024-08

Dear,5 - Create Record➛...➛First name 5 - Create Record➛...➛Last name

An interview has been scheduled, and we require your approval for the proposed date.

Please review the details below and confirm if the date works for you. If the date is acceptable, kindly let us know your availability by suggesting a suitable time.

Your prompt response will help us proceed smoothly with the interview process.

Please check the above details.

Candidate Name :5 - Create Record➛...➛Name of the Candidate

User ID :5 - Create Record➛...➛User ID of the Candidate

 

5 - Create Record➛...➛Description (short_description)
If the Date mentioned above is ok then Please let us know about the time.

Thank you.

Dear,Trigger - Record Created or Updated➛...➛First Name  Trigger - Record Created or Updated➛...➛Last Name

I hope this email finds you well.
